name: 3Rave
description:
A basic game made in 3 days by me! Enjoy.

Sorry I had to release 1.3. It was a major bugfix! Without it, the enemy could sometimes spawn outside the screen!

CHANGELOG

1.3 Fixed enemy bug

1.4 Fixed sticky movement bug and added Follow AI to SmartEnemy. Also added WASD support.

1.5 Added new boss at round 10. Halting development for a break! Chat in the discussion below!

1.6 Added new Menu and death screen.

Thanks for playing. Rave 1 will come out soon!
